section.name: Unzipping a new Version
section.p:
When a new version of Artifactory is delivered it contains again the whole installation zip/tgz.
So, when unzipping a new verson, you need to keep the important subfolders of your Artifactory home:

tr.td:
You need to keep your configuration files. Artifactory upgrades that need configuration will be stated.
The best way on Unix is to have a link instead of this folder.
Most upgrades don't change the DB schema, so just keep this folder on the side during upgrades. The DB files are reused as they are.

section.name: Changing just the war file
section.p:
Actually most Artifactory updates can be done by changing the artifactory.war.
ATTENTION: Avoid hot-deploy as much as possible since jackrabbit/lucene and DerbyDB suffers during the process.
